attributes.review:
I am outraged! I downloaded this app last night because I wanted to support my president ğŸ’• âœ¨, my friends and I discussed this at our local shooting get-together, and they asked me to download it first since they were seeing all of the bad reviews, they were too chicken to download it, so I said weâ€™ll see about that! 

I am a true Trump supporter! I will download it! And I did, last night I got it but the when I opened the app it crashed and sent me back to home screen, confused I open it again and the same thing, eventually it was a battle between the two of us! I would open it and the phone would shut off, suddenly I was sucked into the app where the manifestation of the President showed himself, I bowed down immediately, he is my God after-all! 

Then he told me I had to fight the app in order to log in and he disappeared, I was shocked but did NOT WANT TO disappoint him, I went head to head with the app, kicking him down, ğŸ¥Š  ğŸ’¥ and he pulled me by the hair and threw me across the room where I broke my arm, I screamed but I kept fighting for my beloved president! At the end I was victorious and transported back to the real world and I was holding my phone once again, 

I opened the app one more time, my body in pain and broken, what happened in the app was real, my broken fingers pressed the app and my phone short circuited, Causing my house to catch fire! I barely made it out and went to the hospital, it took a lot out of my bank and now I am homeless, I went to apple to explain my phone issue and they refused to give me a refund so now I am phone less and homeless, I really do support trump but at what cost? Fix this app! And give me back my home! ğŸ
attributes.title: Please fix!
